Articles.Content:
Yuri's Patent Centrifuge!

As the Head Engineer at Halco Aerospace (hiring engineers!), I have to start working on a set of projects for my engineers (there are currently none). I'm aiming towards interplanetary rockets and base modules. My first design is a centrifuge that can go to Mun, Minmus, Eve, Duna, and maybe Ike, Jool, and Dres. It includes a lander with parachutes, RCS, and infinite electric charge. The main craft with the lander has 4,358 delta-v. The monoprop is for rotation, the pods for habitation, and lander is for exploration (rhyming). Of course, you don't have to use the lander. You could dock whatever you want to it! Turn it into a station! 

No pics no clicks.

![vq9PoLO.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/vq9PoLO.jpg?1)

Download!

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/e9hfp5ekojbbkay/Yuri%27s%20Centerfuge.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/e9hfp5ekojbbkay/Yuri%27s%20Centerfuge.craft?dl=0)
